member.summary: Amount of children. This is usually not accurate because the amount changes as controls are added.

member.summary: Amount of children in the previous frame. This is the final counted amount from last frame and it's usually what you're looking for.

member.summary: Combined size of all children. This is not the inner content bounds of the control!

member.summary: Min and max edges of every child in local space

member.summary: How much to offset all children
